thread.title: Genius SP-925BT Bluetooth Speaker
thread.title_full: Genius SP-925BT Bluetooth Speaker | mb.com.ph | Philippine News

author: October 12, 2015
title: Genius SP-925BT Bluetooth Speaker
text: October 12, 2015 If you need a portable speaker to augment the audio quality of your smartphone or tablet while watching your favorite movie series or simply listening to your favorite tracks, consider the Genius SP-925BT Bluetooth Speaker. Powered by Bluetooth 4.0 technology, this newly released speaker allows seamless wireless connection up to 10meters. When fully charged, its battery allows up to 8 hours of playback time. Charging is via micro-USB connection. And when you need to take calls, the speaker features a built-in microphone for hands-free calls. Its 360-degree projection sound offers better audio experience compared to traditional front-facing speakers. It comes with two built-in 5-watt speaker drivers plus a passive radiator base driver subwoofer for better stereo sound quality and extra bass effect.
